author: Sparky Fisk-Magee
text: Can I eat it?  Is it tasty?

author: Cooper Fisk-Magee
text: I'm ready for my tofu anytime now.

author: Sweetpea Parrotlet
text: Aww, you big birdies get all the fun!

author: Sparky Fisk-Magee
text: I'm going to bite you if you don't hurry up with my dinner.

author: Sparky Fisk-Magee
text: Hope there'll be lentils and carrots for dinner.
